Features.EasyDoughForming.VoxelsPerClick: Change the number of voxels that are moved, per click. Min: 1, Max: 8, Default: 1.
Features.EasyDoughForming.InstantComplet: Change whether or not the work item should be instantly completed, on use. True, or False, Default: False.
Features.EasyDoughForming.ModMenu.lblDes: Provides an easier way for players to form dough items, when using Art of Cooking.
Features.EasyDoughForming.ModMenu.lblVox: Determines the number of voxels that are handled at one time, when forming dough
Features.EasyDoughForming.ModMenu.lblIns: Determines whether to instantly complete the current recipe
